>because I can't get it to post under your most admirable hand-waving,
>jumping-up-and-down-trying-to-get-the-teacher's-attention post:
>
>
>Oooops! LOL Go to the head of the class, my pet LOL

Oh thank you, Heidi. What? I'm the only one in the class? No fair!



>I've passed on the phone numbers and fax numbers and URL for CBS. I'd
>write to them, myself, except I didn't see the program and never have
>been one to jump on a bandwagon based on others' opinions. I'm sure
>it was VERY ugly.

You can read it online. Just go to www.cbs.com It was on the evening
news. The first segment was on our Canadian Thanksgiving, and I didn't want
to upset all the unschoolers (my family and my daughter's) by having it
on. So I read it on the website and then responded.
Tia

messages.subject: for tia...
messages.msgSnippet: because I can t get it to post under your most admirable hand-waving, jumping-up-and-down-trying-to-get-the-teacher s-attention post: Oooops! LOL Go to the
messages.messageBody:
because I can't get it to post under your most admirable hand-waving,
jumping-up-and-down-trying-to-get-the-teacher's-attention post:


Oooops! LOL Go to the head of the class, my pet LOL

sorry about that, Tia...I've been so busy these days, I'm barely
peeking in here, and didn't see your post about proofreading until
this morning...

I've passed on the phone numbers and fax numbers and URL for CBS. I'd
write to them, myself, except I didn't see the program and never have
been one to jump on a bandwagon based on others' opinions. I'm sure
it was VERY ugly.

I hope the feedback accomplishes something.

blessings, HeidiC

(hoping this will actually get through)
